chapter.title: Introduction
chapter.para: Horizon is the canonical implementation of OpenStackâ€™s Dashboard, which provides a web based user interface to OpenStack services including Nova, Swift, Keystone, etc.
For a more in-depth look at Horizon and its architecture, see the .
To learn what you need to know to get going, see the .
